pages.text: $(li)The Impaling enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:weapons/trident)Trident$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the damage inflicted to any creature with the enchanted $(l:patchouli:weapons/trident)Trident$(/l).
pages.title: Impaling

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level V.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level VI of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_impaling)Ancient Tome (Impaling)$(/l).
